trait_ZhanXun1_info: Your blade has finally tasted another's blood
trait_ZhanXun3_info: Few enemies dead, but your blade dulls first
trait_ZhanXun5_info: Half a Hundred Slayer! Sounds intimidating enough
trait_ZhanXun6_info: Ten men surround you? You'll carve a path out!
trait_ZhanXun7_info: Corpses pile like mountains! Your armor runs red
trait_ZhanXun8_info: On your third weapon now, eyes growing wilder
trait_ZhanXun9_info: Where you charge, enemy lines part automatically
trait_ZhanXun91_info: At the sight of your banner, enemy wounds ache anew
trait_ZhanXun92_info: A single blow shatters battle lines! Epic deeds unfold
trait_ZhanXun93_info: One warrior against a thousand! Foes call you a Demon God
trait_ZhanXun94_info: Lands you conquer become scorched earth, barren for a decade
trait_ZhanXun95_info: Nations fall because of you. History records your infamy
trait_ZhanXun96_info: A river of blood flows at your feet, you stand at its heart
trait_ZhanXun97_info: Your noble rank is built upon seven thousand skeletons
trait_ZhanXun98_info: Ten thousand bones wither! You are the end of war itself
trait_HunterKing_info: You ask why I killed so many kings? Well, because I like it
trait_Diversification1_info: Still troubled about not meeting your kill count? Then come quickly and use the latest product of the century, the Bloodthirsty Audience Generator, guaranteeing round-the-clock production of bloodthirsty audiences
trait_Diversification1_info_2: 100% heritable, can only be added by players
status_desc_TheUnmovingWiseKing: Greatly enhance armor value, without dizziness or being knocked away
status_desc_Selfde: Greatly increases armor for stronger defense.
status_desc_Strongwind: Greatly increases movement and attack speed, swift as the wind.
status_desc_Yufeng: Massively increases speed, as fast as a storm.
status_desc_teleport: Instantly move, instantly reach enemy cities.
status_desc_andblood: Greatly increases damage, surging with vitality.
status_desc_Overload: Unleash all power, deal massive damage.
status_desc_evilenergy_aura: Unleash evil aura, convert damage to true damage.
ZhanXun_config_auto_collect_ZhanXun Desc: Once enabled, War Deeds can be acquired
ZhanXun_config_auto_collect_Militarytele: Once enabled, armies can use military teleportation spells
ZhanXun_config_auto_collect_Militarystat: Once enabled, military states can use military state teleportation spells
ZhanXun_config_auto_collect_Militarymagi: Once enabled, armies can use military spells
ZhanXun_config_auto_collect_Militarystat: Once enabled, military states can use military state spells
ZhanXun_config_auto_collect_City Descrip: Once enabled, cities cannot be occupied
ZhanXun_config_auto_collect_EternalWar D: Once enabled, all nations will declare war on each other, and when a single empire emerges, all cities will rebel
ZhanXun_config_auto_collect_Adulthood De: Once enabled, all units will automatically reach adulthood
ZhanXun_config_auto_collect_Urbanpopulat: City Population Cap (0 means no population cap)
